histogram.name: Lens.ImageClassification.ClassificationTime.EarlyTerminatedMs
histogram.summary: Logged the time between the start of the Lens image classifcation call to the early termination before the call completes. Only logged on Android.

histogram.name: Lens.ImageClassification.ClassificationTime.SuccessOnQueryResultMs
histogram.summary: Logged the end to end latency of the Lens image classifcation call when the user completes a long press on an image. Only logged on Android.

histogram.name: Lens.ImageClassification.ResultState
histogram.summary: Logged the result state of the Lens image classifcation call when the user completes a long press on an image. Only logged on Android.

histogram.name: Lens.ImageClassification.SdkError
histogram.summary: Logged the error code when there is a Lens SDK error occurred within the classification session. The error code is an integer constant defined by the SDK. Only logged on Android. See http://b/170422682 for more details.

histogram.name: Lens.Omnibox.LensSupportStatus
histogram.summary: Whether the user supports the camera assisted search with Google Lens and if not, the reason why. Recorded only if the feature is enabled when the omnibox or the new tab page is loaded.

histogram.name: Lens.Overlay.Dismissed
histogram.summary: Recorded once when the Lens Overlay feature is dismissed, enumerated by the UI entry point used or the event that triggered the dimissal. In general, it should not be possible to attempt to dismiss the feature if the overlay is not currently showing but if this happens, nothing will be recorded.

histogram.name: Lens.Overlay.Invoked
histogram.summary:
Recorded once when the Lens Overlay feature is invoked, enumerated by the UI entry point used. In general, it should not be possible to attempt to invoke the feature if the overlay is already showing but if this happens, nothing will be recorded.
See also Lens.Overlay.Shown, which is recoded when the overlay is successfully shown.
This UMA histogram is used to track feature usage and retention, and thus should never expire.

histogram.name: Lens.Overlay.Overlay.UserAction
histogram.summary: Recorded each time the user interacts with the Lens Overlay, enumerated by those actions.

histogram.name: Lens.Overlay.PermissionBubble.ByInvocationSource.{InvocationSource}.Shown
histogram.summary: Recorded each time the Lens Permission Bubble is requested to be shown sliced by invocation source.'Shown' is recorded when the Lens Permission Bubble is successfully shown. 'Not Shown' is recorded when the Lens Permission Bubble is already showing.

histogram.name: Lens.Overlay.PermissionBubble.ByInvocationSource.{InvocationSource}.UserAction
histogram.summary: Recorded each time the user interacts with the Lens Permission Bubble, enumerated by those actions and sliced by invocation source.

histogram.name: Lens.Overlay.PermissionBubble.Shown
histogram.summary: Recorded each time the Lens Permission Bubble is requested to be shown. 'Shown' is recorded when the Lens Permission Bubble is successfully shown. 'Not Shown' is recorded when the Lens Permission Bubble is already showing.

histogram.name: Lens.Overlay.PermissionBubble.UserAction
histogram.summary: Recorded each time the user interacts with the Lens Permission Bubble, enumerated by those actions.

histogram.name: Lens.Overlay.Shown
histogram.summary: Recorded once when the lens overlay UI is shown. This UMA histogram is used to track feature usage and retention, and thus should never expire.

histogram.name: Lens.QuickActionSearchWidget.LensSupportStatus
histogram.summary:
Whether the user supports the camera assisted search with Google Lens and if not, the reason why. Recorded only when the Lens button is tapped on the Quick Action Search Widget.
Note: Gap between 04/22 - 08/23.
